docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Welcome to my personal website, not necessary updated!

From september 2019, I moved to Evry - Paris Saclay where I am a full professor, working at IBISC lab.

docs.title: Research Interests
docs.text:
My main research interests are Computer Vision and Machine Learning. I am, in particular, interested in the following subjects:

  • Segmentation, Detection and Tracking
  • Pattern recognition
  • Medical image analysis
  • Autonomous vehicles

docs.title: Publications
docs.text:
Some papers can be downloaded here. If not, do not hesitate to send me an email.

  • dblp profile
  • google scholar profile
  • publications by years

docs.title: News
docs.text:
• I have started serving as an Associate Editor for IEEE RA-L journal.
  • One paper accepted for publication in Pattern Recognition, January 2023.
  • One paper accepted for publication in Sensors, December 2022.
  • One paper accepted for publication in Journal of Intelligent & Robotics Systems, November 2022.
  • My student Marc Blanchon successfully defended his PhD thesis on October 1st, 2021 ! Bravo Dr Marc !
  • I promote the usage of the ha-index, since you can be sure that your ha-index will be greater than your h-index !
  • My student Yifei Zhang successfully defended her PhD thesis on January 19th ! Bravo Dr Yifei !
  • One paper accepted for publication in Multimedia Tools and Application, January 2021.
  • A PhD thesis proposal is available, see details here
  • A master thesis (5-6 months) is available from February 2021. See here.
  • Four papers accepted at ICPR 2020. Congrats to Marc and Yifei !
  • One paper accepted for publication in Image and Vision Computing, September 2020
  • One paper accepted for publication in International Journal of Computer Vision, August 2020
  • Nathan Piasco succesfully defended his PhD thesis on Nov 2019, 2019! Bravo !.
  • Best Vision Paper award finalist, ICRA 2019, congrats to Nathan !
  • Spotlight presentation, BMVC 2019
  • I am been elevated to IEEE Senior Membership, 2019
  • One paper accepted for publication at ICIP 2019
  • Two papers accepted for publication at VISAPP 2019

docs.text:
No position available at the moment

Feel free to contact me

docs.title: Projects
docs.text: Projects I am (or I have been) involved in:

docs.title: 2018-2021 - ANR ICUB
docs.text:
• Non Conventional Imagery for Urban Mobility
  • Partners: LITIS, LE2I, PSA, SteraoLabs

docs.text:
• Long Term Mapping for Urban Mobility
  • Partners: LITIS, LE2I, INRIA, IGN

docs.title: 2015-2016 - Automatic Analysis Tools for DME Detection from SD-OCT
docs.text:
• Merlion Project
  • funded by IFS (Institut Français de Singapour) and SERI (Singapore Eye Research Institute)
  • Partners : SERI, Le2i

docs.title: 2012-2016 - ANR CLAMEB
docs.text:
• Classement mécanique non destructif du bois
  • funded by ANR (Agence Nationale de la Recherche)
  • Partners: Ecole Nationale Supérieure des Arts et Métiers, FCBA, Université de Bourgogne

docs.title: 2012-2015  - FAVE - Fusion Approaches for Visual systems Enhancement
docs.text:
• Funded by FNR CORE (Luxembourg)
  • Partners : SnT, IEE S.A., Le2i

docs.title: 2011-2012 - MOSCA - pMOuvement et Structure en Configurations Atypiques
docs.text:
• Funded by CNRS, INSIS
  • Partners : ISIT, Le2i

docs.title: Publications
docs.text: Google scholar profile: here

[94] S. Hu, F. Bonardi, S. Bouchafa, D. Sidibé, "Multimodal unsupervised domain adaptation for semantic image segmentation", To appear in Pattern Recognition, 2023.

[93] A. Soliman, H. Hadj-Abdelkader, F. Bonardi, S. Bouchafa, D. Sidibé, “MAV localization in large-scale environments: a decoupled optimization/filtering approach”, Sensors, 23(1), pp. 516, 2023.

[92] A. Soliman, F. Bonardi, S. Bouchafa, D. Sidibé, “Robust RGB-D-IMU calibration method applied to GPS-aided pose estimation”, VISAPP, 2023.

[91] A. Soliman, F. Bonardi, D. Sidibé, S. Bouchafa, “IBISCape : a simulated benchmark for multi-modal SLAM systems evaluation in large-scale dynamic environments”, Journal of Intelligent & Robotic Systems, 106(3), pp. 1-24, 2022.

[90] S. Hu, F. Bonardi, S. Bouchafa, D. Sidibé, "A hybrid multimodal visual data cross-fusion for indoor and outdoor segmentation", ICPR, Montreal, Canada, 2022.

[89] S. Hu, F. Bonardi, S. Bouchafa, D. Sidibé, "A general two-branch decoder architecture for improving encoder-decoder image segmentation models", VISAPP, 2022.

[88] Y. Zhang, O. Morel, R. Seulin, F. Meriaudeau, D. Sidibé, "A central multimodal fusion framework for outdoor scenes image segmentation", Multimedia Tools and Applications, 81(9), 12047-12060, 2022.

[87] E. De la Rosa, D. Sidibé, T. Decourselle, T. Leclercq, A. Cochet, A. Lalande, "Myocardial infarction quantification from late galiium enhancement MRI using top-hat transforms and neural networks", Algorithms, 14(8), 2021

[86] N. Piasco, D. Sidibé, C. Demonceaux, V. Gouet-Brunet, "Improving image descriptor with auxiliary modality for visual localization in challenging conditions", International Journal of Computer Vision (IJCV), vol 129(2), pp. 185-202. (pdf)

[85] Y. Zhang, D. Sidibé, O. Morel, F. Mériaudeau, "Deep multimodal fusion for semantic image segmentation: a survey", Image and Vision Computing, 105, 104042, 2021. (pdf)

[84] Y. Zhang, D. Sidibé, O. Morel, F. Mériaudeau, “Incorporating depth information into few-shot semantic segmentation”, ICPR 2020, Milano, Italy. (pdf)

[83] Y. Zhang, D. Sidibé, O. Morel, F. Mériaudeau, “Multiscale attention-based prototypical network for few-shot semantic segmentation”, ICPR 2020, Milano, Italy. (pdf)

[82] M. Blanchon, F. Mériaudeau, O. Morel, R. Seulin, D. Sidibé, “Polarimetric image augmentation”, ICPR 2020, Milano, Italy. (pdf)

[81] M. Blanchon, D. Sidibé, O. Morel, R. Seulin, D. Braun, F. Mériaudeau, “P2D: a self-supervised method for depth estimation from polarimetry”, ICPR 2020, Milano, Italy. (pdf)

• Fundamentals of Mathematics

docs.title: Previous teaching activities at Université de Bourgogne
docs.text: I was mainly teaching in the MSc Vibot and Computer Vision and I used to be the course director. I was in charge of the following courses:

docs.title: Applied Maths
docs.text:
• My lecture notes on probability distributions can be obtained here
  • A note about eigenvalues, SVD and PCA is available here

docs.title: Computer Vision
docs.text:
• Lectures on Epipolar geomatry and Feature Extraction and Matching
  • Lecture on Visual Tracking

docs.title: Probabilistic Robotics
docs.text: • My lecture notes on state estimation (kalman filter, particle filter, etc) are here.

docs.title: Pattern Recognition
docs.text: • Lectures on Linear classification, kernel methods and neural networks.

docs.title: Other Seminars
docs.text:
• Lab seminar on Bag of Visual Words
  • Lab seminar on PCA
